properties.title: Pumptrack Parc des Vorziers
properties.abstract: This facility is located near the Culture and Leisure Centre of Martigny. The 850 m2 pump track offers rollers, berms, loops and jumping elements, while the 650 m2 skate park is an exciting venue for both novice and advanced skaters.
properties.highlights:
Surface area pumptrack: 850 m2
Surface area skatepark: 650 m2
Surface: asphalt
properties.name: Administration municipale de Martigny
